translations: n．合并，联合：指两个或多个事物融合在一起形成一个整体。
· The coalescences of the two companies created a new industry giant.
两家公司的合并创造了一个新的行业巨头。

sentences.sentence: By the study of coalescences test of FWKO, a new type of coalescence called ripple-type packing has been developed.
sentences.translation: 通过游离水脱除器填料的研究，开发出了新型的波纹板聚结填料。
